随便练一下👇
```{r}
library(DiagrammeR)
grViz("
digraph boxes_and_circles{
node[shape=circle,color=royalblue] 
A;B;C;D;E;F
node[shape=box;color=gold1]
1;2;3;4;5
#add edge statements
A->1;B->2;B->3;B->4;C->A;E->B;C->D;C->F;F->5;B->C
#感觉作图的逻辑很清晰，还可以调整细节,比如：penwidth=2.0这个是用来调整线的粗细的；arrowhead=diamond这个是用来调整箭头的形状的
}     
")
```

## 6.7 愉快的夜晚

```{r}
library(DiagrammeR)
grViz("digraph flowchart {
node[fontname=Helvetica,shape=rectangle]
tab1 [label = '@@1']
tab2 [label = '@@2']
tab3 [label = '@@3']
tab4 [label = '@@4']
tab5 [label = '@@5']
tab6 [label = '@@6']
tab7 [label = '@@7']
tab8 [label = '@@8']
tab9 [label = '@@9']
tab10 [label = '@@10']
tab11 [label = '@@11']
tab12 [label = '@@12']
tab1->tab2->tab3->tab8->tab12
tab2->tab4->tab9->tab12
tab2->tab5->tab10->tab12
tab2->tab7->tab11->tab12
tab2->tab6
} 
[1]:'一切准备就绪：水果、零食'    
[2]:'周五例行活动：《我是唱作人》' 
[3]:'钱正昊' 
[4]:'郝云' 
[5]:'白举纲'
[6]:'白安'
[7]:'金志文'
[8]:'背带裤男孩好甜'
[9]:'京味儿民谣的大叔好酷'
[10]:'小白好有少年感'
[11]:'今日份简单走心'
[12]:'开心快乐满足地睡觉！'

")
```
